short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates Vision Automation Framework test cases

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Vision Automation Framework (VAF) Test Case Generator

Streamline your QA process with the VAF Test Case Generator - an essential tool for QA engineers and automation testers working with the Vision Automation Framework.

Key Features:
- Intuitive Sidebar Interface: Easily accessible and non-intrusive design that integrates seamlessly with any web page.
- Smart Element Detection: Automatically identifies and suggests selectors for web elements you interact with.
- Code Generation: Instantly creates VAF-compatible test scripts based on your actions and inputs.
- Multi-tab Output: View generated code in separate, organized tabs for easy reference and copying.
- Customizable Inputs: Tailor your test case parameters directly within the extension.

Perfect for:
- QA Engineers
- Automation Testers
- Developers involved in testing
- Teams using or transitioning to the Vision Automation Framework

Boost your productivity:
- Reduce time spent on writing repetitive test code
- Ensure consistency in test case structure across your team
- Quickly prototype and iterate on test scenarios
- Learn VAF best practices through generated examples

Getting Started:
1. Click the VAF icon to open the sidebar
2. Interact with your web application as normal
3. Use the sidebar to input test case details
4. Generate and review your VAF-compatible test code
5. Copy and paste the code into your test suite

Supercharge your testing workflow with the VAF Test Case Generator - your partner in efficient, effective QA automation.

Note: This extension is designed to work with the Vision Automation Framework. Familiarity with VAF is recommended for optimal use.
